reviews.review: This game is very fun. It captures the essence of seminal horror very well. As a relatively new player, I've not encountered any of the toxicity that the game is supposedly notorious for. It's often on sale; give it a go!

Este juego lo recomiendo para  aquellas personas que  desean pasar el tiempo con amigos o tambi√©n solo, tener la experiencia de llevar a cabo los objetivos de la partida que se deben cumplir en equipo  si eres superviviente o por lo contrario si te gusta ser un tipo solitario, individualista y acechar a tu presa hasta condenarlo ante el ente, te aconsejo ser el asesino.
Lo que m√°s me gusta del juego es que puedes sentir el suspenso, la adrenalina, el susto y sobre todo  re√≠r con amigos cumpliendo los objetivos para que todos puedan escapar vivos del asesino. 
Y si eres el asesino, una sed de sangre por atrapar a los 4 supervivientes que intentan hacer los generadores.
La gran desventaja de este juego, son los servidores ya que se demoran en emparejar las partidas, sin embargo deber√°s que armarte de paciencia y lo segundo son los asesinos camperos que solo esperan que muera el superviviente.
Por eso le doy 9 de 10 al juego.

This game is actually pretty good. If you're not into horror and want to play a horror game that doesn't scare you, this is it. No jump-scares and such, just you and the killer running around. Killer is also really fun and I highly recommend it but you might want to play survivor to learn the game.

EDIT: This video sums it up. https://youtu.be/WYKhAMePZm4 all those perks that require strict timing to be optimal like deadhard won't work optimally. And to add salt to injury, this happens a lot and If I check my ping I have to lowest ping compared to my teammates, in almost every game, you do the math.


This is the game when you want to play something chill while reading h-manga, I can read like 5-6 h-mangas before I get into the game. 
Seriously thou, this game is dead, the que and loading take forever, once you're in a game, you get an afk farming bot killer.
(good thing I haven't bought the DLC, bought the game for less than $5). Let's just get into the cons and pros. A reminder this is coming from a nubie that played the game for a week but has been watching pro people playing, like CoconutRTS, Benjo, Probzz and Gura for a month everyday. Also from a veteran MMORPG and FPS gamer point of view.

Pros:
- The game mechanic is good, perks etc.
- Requires fast thinking, strategy, and fast action.
- Watching pro people playing it's kind of funny.
- Chill game, it's kind of relaxing playing either as survivor or killer.

Cons:
- Fucking shit bug: played a nurse for the first time to finish daily, and got really annoying blink bug, which apparently been going on since 5 yrs ago, omg imagine game breaking bug, still not fixed for 5 yrs, meme material here.
- P2W AND OR Hardcore grind to win + luck. Need a good perk? Grind / buy to unlock character that has the perk, grind to level up the character to unlock the perk, grind the character you want to actually use the perk on (learn the perk).
- Shit dedicated server, Deadhard can't be used optimally, it's either I used deadhard but still got hit, or I have to use it early which is not optimal.
- GPU usage is high 70c degree, 100% usage on what GTX1060 6GB medium settings (Ryzen 5600x). So either you play with garbage graphics (low) or you play Ultra or high (medium is the same thing with high but shit graphics) with 70c heat. Even Apex Legends doesn't get to 70c on medium to high settings. Why a 2016 mid range video card is struggling to handle a 2015 game with shit graphics even on ultra.
- Very limited graphics setting like can't change vsync or frame rate, unless you "manually" edit it
- Toxic MMR (close to Apex's toxic MMR), never really balance.
- Sluggish control.

Summary, this game sucks (kind of) but it's a good game to play while drinking or reading h-manga. If you're new this can't be your main game, it's old, too long to get into a game, and when you're in game the quality of the game is shit, AFK killer etc, unless you're playing on prime time. Too grindy if you want to catch up (unless you spend cash, and it's not cheap, because if you want to have fun with all the good perks, you have to buy a lot of character), because in order to enjoy the game and somewhat win, you have to have good perks against the old players. I'm bored right now with Apex, COD, Splatoon 2, some MMORPG games, and looking for something new that's different and fun, which is this game, but apparently it's also full of shit just like Apex, but for now this will do until Splatoon 3 comes out.

I give it a thumbs down, main reason because the que is long, the server is shit and there's a game breaking bug on a free character. I don't mind it being grindy, if it's a good game, why not, I would play it a lot, but not with shit server, game breaking bug and long que.

Do i actually recommend this game? no, when you play this game your life flashes before your eyes as you slowly lose your brain function to a brightly dressed ted bundy that predicts your every move without fail, or you could play killer, where you lose your sanity to a weeb wearing a cat skin on their favorite bloodied waifu, a weeb that is so good at running laps around you it makes you feel like your racing usain bolt at the olympics. This is all after waiting an half an hour for a game. This cycle continues until you feel like days, weeks, months have passed, turning out that you only played like 3 games(of which you won none). In the end you realize that you are not having any fun, and you go play something else, maybe.... maybe you uninstall it, maybe u delete steam, but it wont matter. You. Will. return.
